name: Defend Redwall
text: Bolster the Great Hall with 3 cubes.

name: Slay Cluny
text: Commit 4 cubes to a final assault.

name: Horde Harrier
text: Commit 2 cubes anywhere along the border.

name: Silent Hunter
text: Gather 4 cubes for a precise strike.

name: Sword of Martin
text: Place 3 cubes with at least 1 badger to gain 1 mastery token.

name: Abbey Restoration
text: Spend 2 food to heal 1 wound and gain 1 morale.
